response.job_title: Tech Lead | Solution Architect | Software Architect | RPA Specialist | Software Development Manager | CTO | Head of Engineering|  Data Visualization | Engineering Manager
response.summary: Solution Architect and Tech Lead with 11years of experience having strong Agile Software Development that apply Project Management best practices as successful delivery driver. I love to innovate and print my creativity and my leadership, I like to lead by example, listen others to build a strong collaborative solution, with the aim of increasing the potential and quality of the solutions produced, always validating innovative alternatives and market trends.
response.skills: Resolución de problemas, Resolución de incidencias, Servicios al cliente, Documentación técnica, Establecer prioridades del trabajo, Scrum, Migración de datos, Metodologías ágiles, Java, Web Applications, Java Enterprise Edition, Software Engineering, .NET, SQL, ASP.NET, Visual C#, Eclipse, Visual Studio, Software Development, English

profile_positions.description:
Lead the team that support production enviroment including CORE applications for the issuance of stock exchanges from all banking and commercial partners to more than thousand different configurations of products, in addition to applications for policy emissions, money collection , data exploitation, claims, digital sales, chat bot and web portals, with multiple type of different users, between employees, partners, advisors and clients. 

Among the responsibilities:
-IT Production Support Coordinator for first level support guaranteeing application high availability.
-Supervision an monitoring of the Support Squad leading a team of six (6) support engineers.
-Management of support cases (service requests and incidents) through Jira with reports and dashboards for the analysis, diagnosis, resolution or escalation of cases.
-Management of change requests through Service Now for the implementation of adjustments with first level resolution of common problems according to the change life cycle.
-Generation of frequent reports of the productive systems on the main data entities.
-Monitoring of productive tools using Dynatrace for availability control, errors, dependencies and related impacts.
-Construction and evolution of the production technical sheets of all the applications.
-Consolidation and growth of the knowledge base for the resolution of recurring problems and the identification of new problems,
-Workload measurement, availability coordination, management of KPIs to support compliance with the ANS, increase customer satisfaction and performance analysis based on the follow-up of the Kanban board.
-Support classification for the identification of recurrent incidents, definition of associated problems for the creation of user stories for the continuous improvement of applications.
profile_positions.title: Production App Support Lead

profile_positions.description:
Team's Solution Architect and Infrastructure Leader. In charge of the management and routing functional and nonfunctional implementation requirements, ensuring quality attributes prioritization, participate in any architectural definitions for QA standardization (documentation and testing), best practices definition, owning the big picture of the around 10 different domain tools, monitoring and control of SVN, definition of the strategic master data, selection of harmonic technologies, reduce incompatible threads, measure the risk of decision.

Also developed some enhancements in .NET WPF with C-Sharp creating sales operations support applications that cover the IT systems gaps. Maintain & Evolve an application that provide full visibility of the opportunities and the sales cycle, allowing near real-time access to proposals, configurations, special prices, quotes, orders, shipments and service requests in general.This to provide the sales force with a tool capable of review their end to end business from each sales member perspective. This tool also automatically send notifications for users and HP customers with attached reports.
profile_positions.title: RPA - Solution Architect

profile_positions.description:
As a part of the solutions delivery team of Hewlett Packard as a CCAm´s client, my work consists to development some .NET Windows Form Applications in C-Sharp language, the project in which I had been part of was:.
• Develop a windows application that automates the management over ther Subversión client TortoiseSVN.
• Improvements of the Orbit Reports Application.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Development of multiple ASP .NET Web Applications in C-Sharp language, the deployed projects in which I have participated are:
• Developing a web application deployed on Windows Azure for the management and operation of Institutions Providing Health Services.
• Service desk web application that use Web Services to communicate with the central system to search, create and manage incidents/tickets/service requests based on ITIL best practices.
• Company’s website that implements basic web portal functionalities, Twitters API integration and communicate with the central system to search, create and manage incidents/tickets/service requests based on ITIL best practices for employees and customers.
profile_positions.title: Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
Development of a set of heterogeneous Java components that are integrated with the engine code generation
and execution framework WebRatio. More specifically, will be held the following extensions:
• Validation Rule to control the "Partita IVA" (VAT) and "Codice fiscale" (tax code).
• Validation Rule to control the code IBAN and BBAN.
• Creation of a Web Application called SocialDemo that integrates the Custom units for the
SocialBPM4People project. (Doodle, Linkedin, Twitter, Google Calendar and Facebook
RESTFull APIs)
profile_positions.title: Intern

company.name: BNP Paribas Cardif
company.description:
BNP Paribas Cardif plays an essential role in the lives of its policyholder clients, providing them with savings and protection solutions that let them realize their goals while protecting themselves from unforeseen events. We create solutions with almost 500 partner distributors in a variety of sectors.

With a presence in more than 30 countries and strong positions in three regions – Europe, Asia and Latin America – BNP Paribas Cardif is a global specialist in personal i#nsurance and a major contributor to financing for the real economy with nearly 8,000 employees worldwide.
